title: Your COVID19 Gardening Plan to Grow Your Own Food
itunes:title: Your COVID19 Gardening Plan to Grow Your Own Food
description: Many of us are relying on our gardens this year for food than ever before. In this episode, I, Jill from the Beginners Gardener and Kevin from Epic Gardening share what our preparedness garden plans look like this year and our top 3 crop choices from 3 very different gardening climates to help you create YOUR gardening plan to feed your family. Get the free how much to plant per person for a year's worth of food chart HTTP://familygardenplan.com
